name: Dice Hunter Hard
description:
Controls 

WASD - Move 

Left mouse button - Shoots and place traps 

Right mouse button - Cancels traps construction 

Dice Hunter Hard is a 2D top-down tower defense game where a lonely hunter must protect his home from crazy neighbors that want his special dice. Fight against endless waves, upgrade your terrain and fortify your defenses, but most importantly... Be lucky. We made this game in 48 hours in construct 3 for the GMTK Game Jam with our blood and tears... Just kidding. That is our first Game Jam, and we hope you enjoy our game!
